text: Hamono Alloh sumoro dar ʙisjore az cojho jori kard. Va niz dar ruzi Hunajn on goh ki ʙisjorii adadi laskaraton sumoro ʙa taaccuʙ ovarda ʙud, vale ʙaroi sumo sude nadost va zamin ʙo hamai vasei va hamvorias ʙar sumo tang sud (va in ʙa on saʙaʙ ʙud, ki dar avvali cang sikast xurda ʙuded). Pas ʙozgasted va ʙa dusman pust gardonded va po ʙa gurez nihoded
